name: David Ramirez
text: There should be a word for when one's brain zooms through a massive blast of thoughts and emotions at a rate faster than can be expressed and then one is just left with an inarticulate shrug and "Fuck it...."

source_obj.text: There should be a word for when one's brain zooms through a massive blast of thoughts and emotions at a rate faster than can be expressed and then one is just left with an inarticulate shrug and "Fuck it...."

replies.text: You could try coining a term for it then vandalizing most of NCR with it. But then ... Duterte. Dun dun dunnn.
